name: Monster Town
description:
The game is a cross between survival and a visual novel. Developed on the Unity 2d engine by two developers. Made especially for The Monster Mash Jam. Please play and enjoy our game. We tried very hard to please you. Who are we:

programmer (me): https://bengria.itch.io/

 artist: https://rediss.itch.io/

Happy Halloween!!!!

P.s. how to play: download the file, unzip and play)
